1.0.name: wordpress/track-the-book
1.0.description: This plugin gives visitors the option to track their book by entering their location and book number into a form. Their location is then turned into coordinates through the use of the Google Maps API and is able to be plotted onto a map. A KML file is also dynamically generated and can be displayed in a map using a separate plugin that reads KML files (i.e XML Google Maps).
